name: Bulb Forest
description:
Bulb Forest is a forest powered by batteries. One day, an event occurred that scattered all the batteries around the forest! Robo, our hero, will go on an adventure to collect all the batteries and bring back power to Bulb Forest.

Left Key and Right Key - Move

Up Key or Space - Jump

Up Key or Space on Spring - Higher Bounce

ESC - Pause

Mouse - Navigate Menus

Features

  • 🔋 Collect 14 batteries scattered around Bulb Forest
  • 🎍 Fun platforming challenges
  • 🕰️ 3 - 6 minutes of playtime

⌨️🖼️ Programming and Sprites by Kaboppel

🎹 Music and SFX by BBTombo

Made with Godot
